title: Arcade secret mission bug
body: Just finished all of the mission, but it does not show me the secret mission, or does this include mission that comes with the passes also?

replies.body: The secret mission should activate after completing all of the mission lines, and this does mean you'll need to finish the 3 bonus missions lines that you get from the pass. I'm going to reach out to a few people to double check this info, since it wouldn't be the first time I was given incorrect information xD!
